sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO student (student_idx, student_name, student_addr, student_age, student_tel, student_education, student_graduate) VALUES (#student_idx#, #student_name#, #student_addr#, #student_age#, #student_tel#, #student_education#, #student_gradute#)
sqlMap.update: UPDATE STUDENT SET STUDENT_ADDR = #student_addr#, STUDENT_TEL = #student_tel#, STUDENT_EDUCATION = #student_education#, STUDENT_GRADUATE = #student_graduate# WHERE STUDENT_IDX = #student_idx#
UPDATE PROJECT_RESULT SET BASIC_PROJECT = #basic_project#, MIDDLE_PROJECT = #middle_project#, FINAL_PROJECT = #final_project# WHERE STUDENT_IDX = #student_idx#
UPDATE LICENSE SET LICENSE_NAME = #license_name# WHERE STUDENT_IDX = #student_idx#
sqlMap.select: SELECT s.STUDENT_NAME, s.STUDENT_AGE, cr.CLASS_NUMBER, s.STUDENT_ADDR, s.STUDENT_TEL, l.LICENSE_NAME, s.STUDENT_EDUCATION, pr.BASIC_PROJECT, pr.MIDDLE_PROJECT, pr.FINAL_PROJECT, s.STUDENT_GRADUATE, s.STUDENT_IDX FROM STUDENT s, CLASS_ROOM cr, LICENSE l, PROJECT_RESULT pr WHERE s.STUDENT_IDX = cr.STUDENT_IDX AND cr.STUDENT_IDX = l.STUDENT_IDX AND l.STUDENT_IDX = pr.STUDENT_IDX AND cr.CLASS_NUMBER = #room#
SELECT s.STUDENT_NAME, s.STUDENT_IDX FROM STUDENT s, CLASS_ROOM cr WHERE s.STUDENT_IDX = cr.STUDENT_IDX AND cr.CLASS_NUMBER = #room#
SELECT s.STUDENT_NAME, s.STUDENT_IDX FROM STUDENT s, CLASS_ROOM cr WHERE s.STUDENT_IDX = cr.STUDENT_IDX
SELECT s.STUDENT_NAME, s.STUDENT_IDX FROM STUDENT s, CLASS_ROOM c WHERE s.STUDENT_NAME LIKE '%'||#name#||'%' AND s.STUDENT_IDX = c.STUDENT_IDX
sqlMap.update: UPDATE ATTENDANCE SET ATTEND_IN_TIME = TO_DATE(#attend_in_time#, 'yyyymmddHH24MI'), ATTEND_OUT_TIME = TO_DATE(#attend_out_time#, 'yyyymmddHH24MI'), ATTEND_DIVISION = #attend_division# WHERE STUDENT_IDX = #student_idx# AND ATTEND_DATE = #attend_date#
sqlMap.select: SELECT s.STUDENT_NAME, s.STUDENT_IDX FROM STUDENT s, CLASS_ROOM cr WHERE s.STUDENT_IDX = cr.STUDENT_IDX
SELECT s.STUDENT_NAME, s.STUDENT_IDX FROM STUDENT s, CLASS_ROOM cr WHERE s.STUDENT_IDX = cr.STUDENT_IDX AND cr.MEMBER_IDX = #idx#
SELECT s.STUDENT_NAME, s.STUDENT_IDX FROM STUDENT s, CLASS_ROOM cr WHERE s.STUDENT_IDX = cr.STUDENT_IDX AND s.STUDENT_NAME LIKE '%'||#name#||'%'
